pages.text: $(li)The Diamond Pickaxe is the upgrade of the Iron Pickaxe.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted placing a pair of Diamonds and Sticks in a Crafting Table.
$(li)This pickaxe opens the possibility of mine Obsidian and Ancient Debris.$(br)$(li)The Diamond Pickaxe has more durability than the Iron Pickaxe.
